briefTitle: Effects of Exemestane on Bone Strength
officialTitle: Effects of Exemestane on Bone Strength in Postmenopausal Women at Increased Risk of Developing Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Mean Percent Change in Total Volumetric Bone Mineral Density (BMD) Measured by High Resolution Peripheral Quantitative Computer Tomography (HR-PQCT) From Baseline to 24 Months
